entry.title: Beehive - A free funding suitability checking tool

link.title: Beehive - A free funding suitability checking tool

entry.content:
Beehive

A free funding suitability checking tool

I founded, designed and developed Beehive. It was a free funding suitability checking tool that used a funder’s guidelines, priorities and open data to produce a report that helped over 18,000+ fund seekers decide where to apply.
